title: Padma Lakshmi
itunes:title: Padma Lakshmi
itunes:subtitle: Padma Lakshmi [Top Chef, Taste The Nation] is an author, actress, producer, and TV host. Padma talks with Anna about her timely new Hulu docu-series Taste The Nation, her work with the UN and the ACLU, growing up in New York and Los Angeles, what she find
description:
On behalf of the Unqualified community we are donating proceeds from this and upcoming episodes to the following:

Justice for Breonna Taylor
Justice for David McAtee
The Okra Project

If you would like to show your support you can follow the links above.

MACY’S Visit macys.com/unqualified where you can not only find all your summer fashion needs, but also access handpicked items by Anna which have been put on a special discount for unqualified listeners only! 
LACROIX Lacroix has new flavors Limoncello. A hint of Limon plus a smooth finish and Pastèque which is French for Watermelon and “deliciously yummy”. For more information and a full list of retailers, visit LaCroixWater.com. You can also join the LaCroix community on Social at @LaCroixWater
EACH & EVERY Visit eachandevery.com/anna and use promo code ANNA for 30% off your first purchase.  That’s not eligible to combine with other discounts or subscription.
BEST FIENDS Best Fiends has thousands of levels already, with new levels, events, and characters added every month.  It’s hours of fun right at your fingertips—and you can even play offline!  With over 100 million downloads and tons of five-star reviews, Best Fiends is a must-play! Download Best Fiends FREE on the Apple App Store or Google Play.

Please subscribe to Anna Faris is Unqualified on Apple Podcasts and follow us on social media:

Instagram @Unqualified
Twitter @Unqualified
Facebook @Anna Faris is Unqualified
Music by: Mondo Cozmo @mondocozmo
Producer: Michael Barrett
Co-producer: Michael Sherman
Co-producer: Cassie Daniels @mscassiedaniels
Production Services: Rabbit Grin Productions rabbitgrinproductions.com

Distributed by: Simplecast


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
